member.summary: This class is used to specify the color for the indicator that appears in the card. The color can be used to identify the priority of the card.

member.summary: Initializes the new instance of class.

member.summary: Initializes the new instance of class.

member.summary: Gets or sets color key for the kanban item.

member.summary: Gets or sets color for the kanban card associated to color key.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.KanbanWorkflow
member.summary: Represents the workflow for a particular category, which is used to determine the target columns a card can be dropped.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.KanbanWorkflow.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the new instance of class.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.KanbanWorkflow.#ctor(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Object})
member.summary: Initializes the new instance of the class.
member.param: Target categories where card can be dropped

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.KanbanWorkflow.Category
member.summary: Gets or sets a source category to which this workflow is applied.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.KanbanWorkflow.AllowedTransitions
member.summary: Gets or sets a target categories to which the card is allowed can drop.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.ItemTapped
member.summary: This event will be fired when we tap on the card.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.DragStart
member.summary: This event will be fired when we start to drag a card.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.DragEnd
member.summary: This event should be fired whenever dragging is cancelled in following cases, Event can be cancelled.When this event is cancelled, card will not be dropped on to the target column.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.DragEnter
member.summary: This event should be fired when a card enters a column. Event can be cancelled. When it is cancelled, DragOver events will not be fired for that target column at all and placeholder should not appear on further move over the same column.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.DragLeave
member.summary: This event should be fired when the card leaves the column. So it means, this event should be preceded by DragStart or DragEnter events.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.DragOver
member.summary: This event will be fired when placeholder appears in new position or whenever placeholder position changes on further move within same column. Usually this event will be called after DragStart or DragEnter events.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.ColumnsGenerated
member.summary: This event will be fired when after the columns are auto-generated. In this event, user can change the header text of the column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection used to generate the content.
member.remarks: will be populated with cards for the data in the ItemsSource. Each item in ItemsSource will be associated to a using either property or property depending on whether the item type is or custom model respectively.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.PlaceholderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance that provides the style for a card placeholder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.ActualColumns
member.summary: Gets the auto-generated s.
member.remarks: If is set to true and also are defined by user, this property will contain both the auto-generated s and also user specified . If is set to false, this property will contain only the user specified columns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.Columns
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of that belongs to .
member.remarks: This is the ContentProperty of the . A determines the schema of the .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.IndicatorColorPalette
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of , which is used to define the colors for each key.
member.remarks: To have a color indicator in the card, define the and map the ColorKey value to the corresponding item's property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.Workflows
member.summary: Gets or sets the workflows. Each item defines the workflow for a particular category, which is used to determine the target columns a card can be dropped.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.ColumnMappingPath
member.summary: Gets or sets a property name, which is used to categorize the columns.
member.remarks: If a list of is bound to property, will automatically categorize the items using property. If contains custom objects, the path of the property which can be used to categorize the card should be explicitly defined using this property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.SfKanban.AutoGenerateColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the can be auto-generated based on the value.
member.remarks: A will be generated automatically only if the user does not specify the explicitly for a category using property.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.KanbanErrorBarSettings
member.summary: This class is used to customize the appearance of error bar that appears in the 's header.
member.remarks: Error bar is a line that appears at the bottom of the header. The color of the error bar indicates whether the column reached the maximum/minimum allowed limit of cards.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.KanbanErrorBarSettings.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets default color for the error bar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.KanbanErrorBarSettings.MinValidationColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the Color value of the error bar for validation.
member.remarks: will be applied to the error bar when 's card count is less than the value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.KanbanErrorBarSettings.MaxValidationColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the Color value of the error bar for the validation.
member.remarks: will be applied to the error bar when 's card count is greater than the value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.Android.KanbanErrorBarSettings.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the error bar
